name: NEDNSProxyManager
desc: An object to create and manage an DNS proxy providerâ€™s configuration.

items.name: class func shared() -> NEDNSProxyManager
items.desc: Returns a singleton DNS proxy manager instance.

items.name: func loadFromPreferences(completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Loads the current DNS proxy configuration from the caller's DNS proxy preferences.

items.name: func saveToPreferences(completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Saves the DNS proxy configuration in the caller's DNS proxy preferences.

items.name: func removeFromPreferences(completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Removes the DNS proxy configuration from the caller's DNS proxy preferences.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: The status of a DNS proxy.

items.name: var providerProtocol: NEDNSProxyProviderProtocol?
items.desc: The provider-specific portion of the DNS proxy configuration.

items.name: var localizedDescription: String?
items.desc: A description of the DNS proxy.

items.name: static let NEDNSProxyConfigurationDidChange: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that is posted when the DNS proxy configuration changes.

items.name: enum NEDNSProxyManagerError
items.desc: The possible DNS proxy manager errors.
